channel.title: Open client problem
channel.description:
Howdy, Roll Eyes
Firsssst of all, i already know im a noob and i'm probably posting this in the wrong area or some shit so you don't need to remind me! ha Sorry, I'm not trying to waste your time or anything, i had a look through various pages and now i'm just confusing myself! When trying to run "run server" it just open's and closes instantly. I clicked compile and this is the error i got :
http://img516.imageshack.us/my.php?image=errore.png
As i already have the new java this makes me think whats the problem?
http://img516.imageshack.us/my.php?image=javaerror.png
Pleaseeeeee help?
Cheers.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2009, 05:51:58 pm[/size][hr]HELP anyone? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2009, 05:52:28 pm[/size][hr]HELP?

item.title: Open client problem
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

ok … it could be 2 things … 1. (most likely) (i did it to my friends ) ( :P) u disable the MS-BATCH files from ur computer and i cant help u with enabling them again … if that is true to test it … use any client or any server source and click runserver or RUN on clients and if it disapeers rite away then … theres ur problem … get a NEW computer ;D

#2. it could be u need a new client or server source because the one u have is messed up both physically but not mentalogically … tats all i know of wats wrong with u

only mentalogically though

Read full topic
